overview: Ido is the Co-Founder and CEO of ClarityRay, enabling publishers to monetize ad-blocked inventory. A 13-year industry veteran, Ido has held senior and executive product positions at DoubleVerify, the global leader in ad-verification, and iMind, a gaming company. Prior to that, Ido founded the UX department in InterBit, helping dozens of clients articulate a winning product vision, and founded Youtell.Me!, a creative marketplace. Ido served in the Israeli Air-Forceâ€™s computer unit (180/Ofek) and is a TAU/Rutgers Alumni.
